subject: Sexual Health
title: Puberty and Nutrition Access
description: One-minute skill: Puberty and Nutrition Access.

hook.text: In countries with chronic malnutrition, puberty may begin years later than in well-nourished populations.

buildup.text: The body requires a minimum amount of body fat and nutrition before the hypothalamus triggers puberty.

discovery.text: Studies show girls in developing nations may start menstruation 2 to 3 years later than girls in wealthy nations.

twist.text: Improved nutrition worldwide is one reason global puberty onset has shifted earlier over the past century.

climax.text: Nutrition access is a fundamental determinant of reproductive health and development across the globe.

punchline.text: When the body lacks fuel, puberty waits.

quiz.question: How does malnutrition affect puberty?
options: It can delay puberty by years
It has no effect on timing
